item.title: Making sure GDAL works with ECW libecw under linux
item.description: This took me a while to unravel, so before I forget or before other people run into the same issues, letâ€™s make a note of this. Assuming you are using a debian-like linux distribution (ubuntu, debian, linux mint, etc. anything using: apt-get to install packages) there are a few things to note. First of all make sure you have the latest packages for: mapserver, gdal, etc. (ubuntu-gis repository has newer versions than the standard repositories).
